generalMeaning: Any thing that can be described as having two semi-circular parts to it, such as two domes on a building or twin speed humps on a road, or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, especially a camel.
nominalLexeme: 1. A large animal that lives in deserts. It has a long neck, and one or two humps on its back. English = camel.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the humps of a camel.
